embed.description: Zoe is balanced - Clipped by Muso_Tensei

replies.body: Lol, that pretty much sums up a lot of champions right now xD

The thing Zoe said at the end basically summed up season 8 as a whole 

> I bet you thought I needed to land my abilities to kill you
Want to point out that Every Assassin + most burst mages(including Annie) would have deleted him a long time ago.

Except how many could have done it through just autoattacks? How many could do it after missing all of their abilities?

Even Yasuo would have needed to land a Q or 2 to kill the Jhin there. Meanwhile Zoe killed him entirely through point and click.

Who needs reasons?

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

> [{quoted}](name=Ravenhale,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=3JPm7lE5,comment-id=000300000000,timestamp=2018-07-31T20:28:21.964+0000)
>
> Who needs reasons?
> 
> {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

I see what you did there.   Thanks for the laugh lol +1
*Jinx laughter intensifies*

No..... she killed him with an ignite sitting on the ground + 3 orbs from W, and then another 3 orbs from picking up and using Redemption, as well as her own summoners. In addition to More Sparkles and Lich Bane auto.


She basically had all the summoners she needed on a silver platter, and imaqtiepie didn't respect that.
But why is it okay that she can even do that in the first place, though? If she whiffs her QE, she shouldn't have unmissable damage to kill you anyway.
Zoe can miss W. It seeks the nearest targets. If he still had minions with him, some of them would have soaked the W's.
They prioritize the target you're attacking, by the way.

Annie can delete you after missing R and W? Talon can delete you after missing both W? Zed can delete you with R and one auto at full HP? FCUK OUTTA HERE M8!

Edit: How can you guys miss the question mark? How bad is your comprehension?

> Zed can delete you with R and one auto at full HP

Fucking w o t
How tf can Talon delete you with just Q and R? He needs his W to procc his passive (aka where most of his damage comes from) dumbass
He didn't say that Talon can do that. He was asking if he could. He was making the point that other champions can't actually kill you if they whiff one or two abilities, so it's unfair that Zoe can.

Dodging her abilities used to be real counterplay until they decided to pump all of her power into her w and passive lmao

Y'all asked for it, calling for her Q to be gutted

> [{quoted}](name=SugeMinPikk,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=3JPm7lE5,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2018-07-31T21:16:23.455+0000)
>
> Dodging her abilities used to be real counterplay until they decided to pump all of her power into her w and passive lmao
> 
> Y'all asked for it, calling for her Q to be gutted

No, we actually just don't want this champion to be viable.

Awful design SHOULD NOT BE VIABLE, Zoe deserves to be gutted into the ground.

I just pick TF into Zoe. Koreans just pick TF into Zoe. TF is her 4th most common matchup and her 4th lowest winrate matchup. 

{{champion:4}} best champion in the game. When in doubt, just pick TF.

> [{quoted}](name=SugeMinPikk,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=3JPm7lE5,comment-id=000600000000,timestamp=2018-07-31T23:16:56.903+0000)
>
> I just pick TF into Zoe. Koreans just pick TF into Zoe. TF is her 4th most common matchup and her 4th lowest winrate matchup. 
> 
> {{champion:4}} best champion in the game. When in doubt, just pick TF.

{{champion:90}}  is mighty fine against her too.  His entire kit hard counters her entire kit.

> [{quoted}](name=Lafirenze,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=3JPm7lE5,comment-id=0006000000000000,timestamp=2018-07-31T23:44:14.533+0000)
>
> {{champion:90}}  is mighty fine against her too.  His entire kit hard counters her entire kit.

Not once she gets Luden, and if she buys protobelt it's a straight up malzahar counter. Malz has garbage sustained damage and if she plays aggressive early due to Malzahar's atrocious pre-6 early game, she can deny him a metric ton of CS.

It's just that most people are terrible and don't even attempt to kill his voidlings with a simple auto if not her Q.

> [{quoted}](name=Crescent Dusk,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=3JPm7lE5,comment-id=00060000000000000001,timestamp=2018-08-01T05:32:50.912+0000)
>
> Not once she gets Luden, **and if she buys protobelt it's a straight up malzahar counter**. **Malz has garbage sustained damag**e and if she plays aggressive early due to** Malzahar's atrocious pre-6 early game**, _**she can deny him a metric ton of CS.**_
> 
> It's just that most people are terrible and don't even attempt to kill his voidlings with a simple auto if not her Q.

Do you even play this game? You straight out labeled the opposite of whats going to happen.
This is the reason why the balance team will never hear you guys out. You guys are bad at this game, that you cannot even play malzahar against zoe.

I bet if you die playing malz against Zoe, who rushed a protobelt, you will die 20 times in lane if you use a different champion.
Just pink ward the skill shot lol
This isn't even Zoe. Most of the damage was Ignite, Electrocute, and then just a few autos that deal moderate damage thanks to her W. That could be any champion though.

> [{quoted}](name=Big Ol Tree,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=3JPm7lE5,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-07-31T20:07:51.309+0000)
>
> This isn't even Zoe. Most of the damage was Ignite, Electrocute, and then just a few autos that deal moderate damage thanks to her W. That could be any champion though.

True enough, electrolute&ignite OP.

Zoe is a burst mage. Syndra is a burst mage. Syndra can't kill anyone by missing all her skills (meaning she wouldn't press R either). She's also not even ahead. Jhin is 2/3, Zoe is 2/1 with a single item
actually she was 1-2 and jhin was 2-2-4

> [{quoted}](name=Beatrice falls,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=3JPm7lE5,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2018-07-31T20:32:07.200+0000)
>
> Zoe is a burst mage. Syndra is a burst mage. Syndra can't kill anyone by missing all her skills (meaning she wouldn't press R either). She's also not even ahead. Jhin is 2/3, Zoe is 2/1 with a single item

To be fair i actually think Syndra could have won that fight in similar circumstances as long as she lands even a single skillshot and has ignite&ulti&electrolute.

Ignite and electrolute deal a lot of damage, luden is just free damage and rest is auto attacks much the same.


The sad truth is that damage is high, really damn high.

And there are no magic resist runes, or scaling armor.
1 skillshot is still more then Zoe landed tho.
Not really. She landed 6 Balls of damage from her W, and 3 autos, Ignite, and Could have even healed herself with Redemption. Imaqtpie gave her 2 summoner's freely and didn't respect that.

Oh yeah man all those skillshots.

Seriously, its ine thing to be biased, it's another entirely tk ne objectively wrong.

Autos and zoe's W orbs are *not skillshots* . Neither is Ignite. Dont know if this is news to you.

The point still stands that Qt didn't respect her at all. He could have EASILY just walked away from her and instead fought her KNOWING full well she would get 3 W procs off. She missed E. Can literally just walk away and instead he stayed and fought and lost. Also, how would you have felt if Qt DID win the 1v1 here? He missed his W as well. Which character is it okay to miss skillshots on and win?

Oh sure, Zoe missed all of her skillshots, now I can go in and kill her! Oh wait, Zoe just randomly has an ignite that she literally picked up off the ground? Well, guess I literally cant fo near her for the next, what was it, 45 seconds?  Or else she just wins because she just gets a billion things for free. 

Meanwhile during that time she can keep trying again and again for big poke and dont I dare try to do anything about it or I lose 

So what exactly is one supposed? Letting Zoe do whatever she wants is not fucking counterplay.

Profanity aside, this is a very good summary of the design issues with Zoe. As a huge fan Kalista, if Kalista is left in the dumpster because of "counterplay issues", then Zoe belongs in the bottom of that dumpster based on that benchmark. However, I don't think Kalista nor Zoe should be dumpstered; they should instead be fixed. Getting rid of Zoe's RNG free summoners would be a great step in the right direction. I would also like to see it so that unless she is ahead, an E-Q combo no longer one shots a squishy. The whole 'E' from the fog of war thing makes the power of this combo really unfair (as it lacks "counterplay").

Personally I think that they should scrap her W completely, remake it into a damage spell, and tune her around having 3 damage spells. Even if they cut the damage off of her W and passive again, she'll still be the issue of a burst mage with one real damage ability, so she's everything or nothing.

There are a few champions that have 1 damage ability, but they're supports, so they aren't aiming to 100-0 you{{champion:432}} {{champion:37}} {{champion:26}} A Burst Mage should have a rotation, not 1 all-or-nothing damage spell, and not whatever it is that Zoe does.
Zoe is about as much as a Mage as LeBlanc is.
ADCs hp is a total joke now.

> [{quoted}](name=POMÆ,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=3JPm7lE5,comment-id=001b,timestamp=2018-08-01T04:12:43.232+0000)
>
> ADCs hp is a total joke now.

ADC's are fine. They don't need buffs, other roles need nerfs.
He needed to dodge ignite

Why don't they just remove the damage on W?

It already gives free summoner spells, item actives, and movement speed. It doesn't also need Fox-Fire 2.0, too.

1. Electrocute needs a nerf. 
2. It was auto's + Zoe passive, Electrocute, Ignite + w passive, and Ludens.
2. Yeah he evaded all Zoe's skills; *Zoe also evaded all his skills*. He literally only got his auto's and ignite in. His q didn't even hit because Zoe r'd out of range right when QT q'd the minion.

At least be fair.

> [{quoted}](name=TheDevice,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=3JPm7lE5,comment-id=0023,timestamp=2018-08-01T08:09:59.873+0000)
>
> Yeah he evaded all Zoe's skills; *Zoe also evaded all his skills*.

Missing abilities should have much more consequence for an ability-reliant champion than an auto-reliant one.
ignite should not be allowed to proc electrocute. That would solve some of the problem not just for Zoe, but for anyone who can 100-0 you just because they have electrocute/ignite.

> [{quoted}](name=MetaVolca,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=3JPm7lE5,comment-id=,timestamp=2018-07-31T20:00:45.318+0000)
>
> _Flashes M7 on Zoe_

people are stupid when playing vs zoe. you see she has ignite on W and is playing aggressive to try and get it off, why not just back the fuck off for 30 seconds till it goes away? instead you try to fight a champion that is obviously trying to CHEESE you with double ignite. every time this happens idiots die to double ignite and say "zoe op pls nerf" when she litterally has zero kill potential without it. matter of fact he could have even zoned her off the ignite drop if he payed attention to it.

can we just have a bit of common sense for two seconds on these boards?
So what your saying is jhin shouldn't get near Zoe for 30 FUCKING SECONDS because of her W? Lmao.Don't for a second justify what Zoe did there,such a cancerous design shouldn't be allowed.

> [{quoted}](name=TheKingOfBiches,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=3JPm7lE5,comment-id=000c0000,timestamp=2018-07-31T23:09:37.901+0000)
>
> So what your saying is jhin shouldn't get near Zoe for 30 FUCKING SECONDS because of her W? Lmao.Don't for a second justify what Zoe did there,such a cancerous design shouldn't be allowed.

why not? he was farming. its no different from him walking up and getting Qed by a {{champion:131}} like a retard. which btw bursts harder.
but now imagine diana missing q and r and still autoing you and winning
Zoe didn't miss her W 6 orbs, Ignite, Electrocute, or More Sparkles.....
Stop being an idiot and trying to spread lies everywhere. Zoe missed her actual skillshots, and yet still killed with all of her TARGETTED, UNMISSABLE DAMAGE.
